name: Advanced Python Programming
description: This course will teach you advanced Python programming techniques, including object-oriented programming, data structures, and algorithms.

instructor.name: Jane Doe
instructor.bio: Jane Doe is a software engineer with over 10 years of experience. She has worked for several startups and large companies, and she is passionate about teaching.

cancellationPolicy: Cancellations must be made at least 14 days before the start of the course to receive a full refund.
